thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-GVC Holdings Says To Acquire 51 Pct Equity Capital Of Mars Llc

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-GVC Holdings Says To Acquire 51 Pct Equity Capital Of Mars Llc

organizations.name: pct equity capital of mars llc

text:
March 5 (Reuters) - GVC Holdings Plc:
* SAYS AGREED TO INITIALLY ACQUIRE 51% OF EQUITY CAPITAL OF MARS LLC
* SAYS DEAL WITH A COMMITMENT TO ACQUIRE REMAINING 49% IN 2021
* ‍TO ACQUIRE AN INITIAL 51% OF EQUITY CAPITAL OF CRYSTALBET FOR A CONSIDERATION OF EUR 41.3M, PLUS A WORKING CAPITAL ADJUSTMENT, TO BE SATISFIED ALL IN CASH FROM EXISTING GVC RESOURCES​
* SAYS COMPLETION EXPECTED TO OCCUR BY END OF MARCH 2018 * ‍OPERATIONAL MANAGEMENT TEAM AT CRYSTALBET WILL REMAIN WITH CRYSTALBET, RETAIN FULL EQUITY SHAREHOLDINGS IN CRYSTALBET FOLLOWING INITIAL ACQUISITION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
